answers.answer: no, er asap !!!! can be preclampsia. :/
My hands swelled the entire time I was pregnant last time. My doctor told me it was normal and to watch my salt intake.
I don't really eat to much of anything thing that contains salt but if it keeps up ima go to the er
Mine do it I can't wear my wedding ring anymore but everything is perfect with baby
Since last week at 38 weeks I have been getting horrible hand swelling. To the point of it being extremely painful. It looks like I have kankles on my hands.
I would call your doctor and see if s/he thinks it's something to be concerned about. Swelling of the hands and face can be indicative of preeclampsia, so it's better to be safe than sorry.
Yeah my feet do it too but not as bad as my hands

question: so is it normal to have have hand swelling? Being 36 weeks
title: Swelling
